text: Hi all, I'm just landing at PDX. Please standup via slack. See you soon!

Friday:
* Cap scan and comms routines are optimized and VERY fast
* Reading all wines from /api/ endpoint will now light up caps. Results are visually instant.

Today: 
* Plumb in cap light updates to the other endpoints so that app interactions will trigger blinking lights
* Finish reading the 2 whitepapers I found on D1000 power optimization

2.) Want to get cap designs altered to fit the current stack.

2B.) Wondering if Josh D. can assist with it as well.
3.) I need to write copy for the demo once it’s there.
